summary: A documentary about George A. Romero's films, with a behind scenes look at Dawn of the Dead.
cast: Susan Tyrrell|Nicole Potter|George A. Romero|Richard P. Rubinstein|Michael Gornick|Carl Augenstein|Tom Savini|Ken Foree|Scott H. Reiniger|David Emge|John Amplas|Roy Frumkes|Christine Forrest|Gahan Wilson|Steve Bissette|Joe Kane|Gregory Lamberson|Dave Bartholomew|Pasquale Buba|Butchie|Dave Hawkins|Tom Kapusta|Katherine Kolbert|Doug Mertz|Rudy Ricci|Cindy Roman|Lenny Roman|Gaylen Ross|Nick Tallo|Danny Vail|Larry Vaira
title: Document of the Dead
